entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 6.8°C
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers before morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 over southern sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy. Periods of freezing rain over northern sections in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
